message: So, did anyone manage to get a copy of Toms OPML and would they share? :)
Here is Tom's OPML from Google Reader: http://pastebin.com/68LvcVdS
Seems all of Toms fans are busy downloading it right now, pastebin can't handle the load at the moment *g*
Hm, didn't I write a longer comment at the top? Not post editing us are you convore?
@emerysteele Thanks for the posting! I figured I missed it being in the car at the time.
